Package gamelogic

Class Node

  • java.lang.Object
    • gamelogic.Node
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AddNode, AndNode, CompareNode, CurEntityNode, CurSpeciesNode, DimNode, EqualNode, EuclDivNode, IfElseNode, IntsToVecNode, NotNode, OrNode, RandDoubleNode, RandIntNode, SubNode, SurfaceAtNode, TerminalNode, TerrainNode, TimeNode, ValueNode, VecToIntsNode
    public abstract class Node
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides the abstract node model for the nodes used in the nodal system. A node can be evaluated, meaning it will retrieve data from its input(s), do calculations with it, and store the result(s) in its output(s). To create a new node, extend this class in the package gamelogic.nodes.
    See Also:
    Input, Output
